bio: Creating podcasts and documentaries exploring the World of Work in Web3.
impactDescription: The contributions I have submitted is an effort in documentation and enhancing the visibility and understanding of web3, furthering our goals in the Optimism Collective. Through various formats of storytelling, I seek to engage and inform the community what it is like to work in web3.
contributionDescription:
I am submitting my contributions in the form of onchain media, about web3, which was created within past 2 months, & minted on OP stack.
1) 'The Onchain Summer Music Video', a fun entertaining video speaking to a number of people about their first onchain experiences.
2) A mini-documentary 'Stand with Crypto'  making a case for how we're building a foundation for the future in web3.
3) Short movies about Nouns Prop House minted on Zora Network.
4) A blog that I have written on fulltimedao.com, a research project exploring the inner workings of about DAOs. The recent edition hosted on paragraph is available to mint on Base.

fundingSources.description: From the mints of The Onchain Summer Music Video
